row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.POWERSHELL_UTILITY :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Folder/File path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail if missing" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL#
!Check EXT: of parameters :SET &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 0 :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Folder/File path" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Fail if missing" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_PARAM_VALIDITY &INPUT_PARAM# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL#
:IF &UC4RB_PV_ERRORS# = 100 __uc_return(100) :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_WINDOWS_STYLE :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
! Start execution :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
:SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "delete file '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME#' " :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO#, "with flag 'Fail if missing' is '&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL#'") :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
:SET &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_WILDCARD :SET &UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME# = &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING#
java -jar `"&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#file-system-tool.jar`" file FileDelete `"&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_NAME#`" "&UC4RB_DIR_FILE_RM_FAIL#" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_POWERSHELL_CMD@WINDOWS
